description: This file defines a React component called DurationStackedBar that renders a horizontal stacked bar chart using the 'recharts' library. It visualizes behavioral data with specific color coding based on behavior palette definitions, and filters behaviors to include only a predefined set of behaviors.

methods.name: DurationStackedBar
methods.description: React functional component that renders a responsive, horizontal stacked bar chart visualizing behavior durations, filtered and ordered based on predefined behavior keys.
